Name: Janus Cast
Author: Unai Gonzalez

Actions.Name: Send Payload
Actions.Tooltip: Send a custom payload to a network address with a single press

Description: Janus Cast is a Stream Deck plugin that allows you to send custom payloads over TCP or UDP to any IP address, hostname, or domain. It also logs all communication in real time, including server responses, making it ideal for interacting with network services or devices directly from your Stream Deck.
